short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Salesforce Metadata Deploy Monitor Chrome Extension simplifies tracking and monitoring the status of metadata deployments…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Salesforce Metadata Deploy Monitor Chrome Extension simplifies tracking and monitoring the status of metadata deployments directly within Salesforce. Whether you’re deploying a new package or updating an existing one, this extension allows you to view real-time deployment progress without navigating through multiple Salesforce pages using new Chrome Extension feature - sidepanel.
